doc.title: Food from Japan is safe to eat
doc.text: A/DT lot/NN of/IN Singaporeans/NNS are/VBP worried/VBN about/IN food/NN coming/NN from/IN Japan/NNP ,/, but/CC some/JJ restaurants/NNS like/IN Tatsuya/NN continues/VBZ to/TO source/VB their/PRP$ produce/NN from/IN Japan/NNP because/IN using/VBG ingredients/NNS from/IN elsewhere/RB would/MD seriously/RB compromise/VB the/DT taste/NN of/IN the/DT dish/NN ./.
